name: Tanks (itch) (elmagico)
description:
TANKS a 2 player on 1 keyboard Game That you can play with your friends.

Tanks is based on the unity Tanks tutorial.

I have spice it a little with some POWERUPS.

Controlls Player 1

wasd = up, turn left, down, turn right.  Shoot with SPACEBAR

Player 2

arrow keys Shoot with ENTER

If you want to learn how it work and try it out here is the link

ENJOY
